name: Front Mission 2089: Borderscape
summary:
Front Mission is a futuristic dystopian warfare-themed game series. In this world, society is secretly puppeteered by a large federation composed of various countries, and constant regional conflicts have become the destructive norm. The stories about humanoid weapons and their pilots will unfold through battles intertwined with blood and tears.

The vision for this new entry, FRONT MISSION 2089: Borderscape, focuses on the eve of the Second Huffman War and the escalating secret regional conflict.
